thread.section_title: Harvey Norman Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Harvey Norman Ireland | harveynorman.ie

text: I ordered a stream cleaner online. The product arrived opened and appeared to have been used, and the manual/instructions were also missing. I telephoned customer services who got the store manager to call two days later. He denied product had been used but could not explain why the box was open or the manual/instructions were missing. He undertook to get a new manual from the manufacturer and said he would call with an update. This was two weeks ago and I'm still waiting.
